creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: four full lines of neat calligraphy; shorter signature line at L; mounted to textured paper with many inclusions
inscription: 却嫌獨往少風流更拉隣翁興自由厚禄故人有歡酒山花開処苦相求(Since traveling alone has little panache, / I bring along my old neighbor to enjoy free time. / With his rich pension my friend has fine wine, / So where mountain flower blossom, let\'s drink!)
markings: LLC, square intaglio: 長胤之印; L side when rolled, in pencil: [Ito Togai];
title: Traveling with a Friend
